title: Language Learning MOOC Through Network-Based Collaboration: Collective Intelligence Building Project

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital device utilization skills and language learning experience
context.additional_context: Environment promoting social interaction and self-directed learning for adult learners over 40. Provision of real-time language use scenarios via VR simulation and BYOD (Bring Your Own Device)-based access

learning_goals: Learners improve problem-solving skills using collective intelligence by performing three or more language collaboration tasks in VR-based simulation environments.
Learners form social learning communities through feedback exchanges, including peer evaluations, at least twice weekly in open online discussion forums.
Learners submit creative outputs based on collective intelligence by completing team-based language projects (cultural comparison presentations) within one week.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
